title: Lily has a black cat and a white cat. 冠词用法 (T(or)F？
analysis: 名词是秃子，常要戴帽子；可数名词单，须用a或an；辅音前用a，an用元音前；若为特指时，则须用定冠；复数不可数，泛指the不见；碰到代词时，冠词均不见(冠词-1)。

title: Lucy has a computer and a TV. 冠词用法 (T(or)F？
analysis: 名词是秃子，常要戴帽子；可数名词单，须用a或an；辅音前用a，an用元音前；若为特指时，则须用定冠；复数不可数，泛指the不见；碰到代词时，冠词均不见(冠词-1)。

title: The cat and the dog are good friends. 冠词用法 (T(or)F？
analysis: 名词是秃子，常要戴帽子；可数名词单，须用a或an；辅音前用a，an用元音前；若为特指时，则须用定冠；复数不可数，泛指the不见；碰到代词时，冠词均不见(冠词-1)。

title: The TV is smaller than the computer. 冠词用法 (T(or)F？
analysis: 名词是秃子，常要戴帽子；可数名词单，须用a或an；辅音前用a，an用元音前；若为特指时，则须用定冠；复数不可数，泛指the不见；碰到代词时，冠词均不见(冠词-1)。

title: The dog is smaller than the cat. 冠词用法 (T(or)F？
analysis: 名词是秃子，常要戴帽子；可数名词单，须用a或an；辅音前用a，an用元音前；若为特指时，则须用定冠；复数不可数，泛指the不见；碰到代词时，冠词均不见(冠词-1)。

title: -->Is India _ English speaking country?-->I’ve no idea. Let’s go and ask Mr.Wu.
analysis: English是以元音开头的单词，因此要用an表示“一个”(冠词-1)。

title: —>Do you enjoy your stay in Hangzhou?-->Yes. I’ve had _ wonderful time.
analysis: have a wonderful time 是固定的词组搭配(冠词-1)。

title: -->Tom,what’s on the desk?-->Can’t you see?There is _ pen on it.
My father is _ engineer. He works very hard.
analysis: engineer 是元音开头的单词，用an 表示"一"(冠词-1)

title: -->Where is Xiao Ming? -->He’s having _ rest over there.
analysis: have a rest 是固定的词组(冠词-1)。

title: -->I saw _ beautiful bike in that shop yesterday.-->What color is it? Was it _ red one?
Let’s go to cinema, shall we?(填入正确的冠词)
answer: Let’s go to the cinema, shall we?

title: Cow is a useful animal.(填入正确的冠词)
answer: A Cow is a useful animal.

title: Now many children learn to play piano after school.(填入正确的冠词)
answer: Now many children learn to play the piano after school.
analysis: 乐器名称前用定冠词the。eg:play the piano, play the violin(冠词-1)

title: Beijing is capital of people’s Republic of China.(填入正确的冠词)
answer: Beijing is the capital of people’s Republic of China.
analysis: 用在专有名词前eg: the Great Wall, the People’s Republic of China(冠词-1)

title: Please pass me English book on the desk.(填入正确的冠词)
answer: Please pass me the English book on the desk.

title: This is first history lesson this term.(填入正确的冠词)
answer: This is the first history lesson this term.

title: Have you ever been to Yellow River?(填入正确的冠词)
answer: Have you ever been to the Yellow River?
analysis: 用在专有名词前eg: the Great Wall, the People’s Republic of China(冠词-1)

title: Lend me all books you have.(填入正确的冠词)
answer: Lend me all the books you have.
analysis: 当定冠词与 all ,half, both,double 等词连用，修饰名词时，定冠词要放在这些词之后(冠词-1)。

title: Both windows are not open.(填入正确的冠词)
answer: Both the windows are not open.
analysis: 当定冠词与 all ,half, both,double 等词连用，修饰名词时，定冠词要放在这些词之后(冠词-1)

title: -->_ you swim? -->Yes, but I’m not a good swimmer.
-->Would you like to see Beijing Opera with me tonight? -->I’d like to, but I’m afraid I _ . I have to write to my pen friend.
需要帮忙吗/我可以帮你么?(翻译)
analysis: can 表示请求,多用于疑问句中.意思是-可以(情态动词can)。

title: 你可以告诉我去书店的路吗? (翻译)
answer: Can you tell me the way to the bookstore?
analysis: can 表示请求,多用于疑问句中.意思是-可以(情态动词can)

title: A:_ I finish my homework now?B:No, you _ . You _ do it tomorrow.
A:This pencil is very short, _ you still use it?B:No, I _. You _ buy one for me.
A:_ I go out and play basketball, mum?B:No, you _ finish your homework first.
A:_ I play football in the street?B:No,you _.
A: _ you find many people in the doctor’s waiting room.B:No, I _.
这消息可能是真的吗?(翻译)
analysis: can用于否定和疑问句中，表示可能性，意思是”可能”can’t意思是”不可能”(情态动词can)。

title: 他不可能在家。他的门是锁着的(翻译)
answer: He can’t be at home. His door is locked.
analysis: can用于否定和疑问句中，表示可能性，意思是”可能”can’t意思是”不可能”(情态动词can)。

title: -->Can you answer my question, Lily? -->Yes, I _.
analysis: 对于can的一般疑问句常用can来回答(情态动词can)

title: -->I think Miss Gao must be in the library. She said she would go there. -->No, she _ be there. I have just been there.
analysis: 表示否定的-不可能要用can’t,而mustn’t表示-禁止的意思(情态动词can)

title: -->Excuse me, _ you tell me the way to the nearest bus station? -->Sorry. I can’t. I’m a stranger here.
analysis: Can you tell me the way to ……为常用句型(情态动词can)

title: We can eat in the dining room. But we _ eat in the classroom.
-->_ I take some photos in the hall? -->No, you _.
Can your brother swim?-->_.
-->Can you cook fish? -->_. It’s easy.
-->What are the school rules?-->We _ arrive late for class.
I like swimming, but I _ swim.
-->I want to join the sports club.-->Can you _?-->Yes, I can.
Run in the hallways.(改否定句)>_ _ in the hallways.
I have to get up at six.(改一般疑问句)>_ you _ to get up at six?
I can eat in the dining hall.(提问句)>_ _ you eat?
We have to clean the room.(提问句)>_ do you have to_?
late, can, arrive, for, we, not, school(连成一句)
answer: We can not arrive late for school.

title: Lingling can ride a horse.(改一般疑问句)
I Can speak Chinese.(改一般疑问句)
Lingling and Daming can play the piano.(改一般疑问句)
answer: Can Lingling and Daming play the piano?

title: My father can play table tennis.(改一般疑问句)
answer: Can your father play table tennis?

title: Lingling can ride a horse.(变为否定句)
He can speak Chinese.
Lingling and Daming can play the piano.
answer: Lingling and Daming can’t play the piano.

title: My father can play table tennis.
answer: My father can’t play table tennis.

title: She can swim.(变为否定句)
